type: Request for Supply Arrangements General Contractor and Renovation Services
short_summary: Parks Canada requires the services of General Contractors in Prince Edward Island to manage all aspects of multi discipline projects that may include demolition, renovation, and construction of various equipment, services or structures.
description: Multi discipline projects: multi-discipline projects which may include demolition, renovation and construction of various equipment, services or structures. (Time and materials contracts of up to $100,000.00 (including applicable taxes)). Projects will be awarded on an
duration_in_months: , Special Instructions: This will be a supply arrangement with the option to allow the supplier to provide general contractor services by letting the supplier win all or some of the tenders made under the arrangement; The awards will be made for up to a maximum of 5 (Five) years commencing on date of award to September 30, 2025.
